about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hello, I'm Muzaffer Savcıoğlu. Born in Istanbul in 2005, my curiosity for technology led me to the world of engineering. I am currently a 3rd-year Computer Engineering student at Istanbul Rumeli University. Additionally, I am a 5th-term scholar at the Artificial Intelligence and Technology Academy in the Artificial Intelligence department.

I am building my career path around Artificial Intelligence development and modern software technologies. While I enjoy solving complex problems through code, life for me isn't just about screens. I owe my discipline to sports and my creativity to music. I play the guitar, piano, and bağlama proficiently. I am also an avid sports enthusiast and participant. I believe in continuous improvement, both in the digital world and in real life.

desc.moodify: Interactive AI app analyzing the emotional tone of Turkish text (BERT) to suggest music matching your mood. Features logic to understand complex phrases like 'not bad'.
desc.alaz: 1st Prize Winner at Tech Istanbul Innovation Camp. Early response system for forest fires using an AI-supported drone fleet.
desc.football: Comparative analysis of A*, Dijkstra, BFS, and Gradient algorithms for Algorithm Analysis course; calculates optimal paths for a ball to bypass opponents.
desc.rumelicare: Comprehensive SQL database project for clinical management. Includes ER diagrams and queries designed using MySQL Workbench.
desc.sjf: Analysis tool developed for Operating Systems course comparing performance metrics (wait times, etc.) of SJF (Shortest Job First) and Round Robin algorithms.
desc.clock: Real-time digital clock simulation displaying date, hour, minute, and second, developed in Assembly language for Microprocessors course.
